name: Chavcos
description:
Credits:

James Neild - Programming 

Daniel Hardy -3D Artist,

Rowan Jackson - Music and textures.

Backstory:

As a small child you have been dragged to the supermarket by your parents, naturally you become bored quickly and decide to wonder off by yourself and explore the corners of Chavcos. Suddenly 2 Chavcos employees have a fight and pushed over some of the shelfs and boxes, separating you from your parents. When you come to the realisation you're all alone you remember there are no adults to tell you what to do at this point in time.  So you pick up A LOT of junk as possible and escape the store. But be cautious of your surroundings you don't want to run into a wall, could leave you pretty dizzy.

Controls and goal:

Collect all 50 Junk in the Chavcos supermarket. WASD and ARROW keys to move
